title: Skybound Only Up
description: Climb, jump, and parkour your way through Skybound Only Up. Choose safer or riskier routes, navigate obstacles, and reach new heights in this straightforward but challenging adventure. How far—and how fast—can you climb without falling?
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Skybound: Only Up-1b5zh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b31041ff2f934d19954ee76213cf8266/skybound-only-up-1b5zh.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
*Skybound Only Up* is a straightforward parkour adventure that challenges players to navigate towering obstacles and explore new heights. Choose your route through multiple paths—some safer but slower, others faster with added risks—letting you control the pace and difficulty of your climb. The environment is filled with hidden shortcuts and surprising challenges, including a maze with concealed dangers and new obstacles like wind hazards and moving, rotating, or disappearing platforms, all designed to test your timing and precision. With easy-to-learn controls and a pull-up function, you can dive straight into exploring alternate routes and beating personal bests. A timer rewards speed and skill with medals, from Bronze to Platinum, adding a new layer of achievement to your adventure. Enhanced by engaging visuals and a richly dynamic world, Skybound Only Up invites you to climb higher and uncover the secrets above.

<!--image-->
![Skybound: Only Up-147o7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b31041ff2f934d19954ee76213cf8266/skybound-only-up-147o7.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unique and Engaging Obstacles
<!--text-->
The game presents a variety of intricate and visually impressive challenges, including a maze with a lurking danger that leads to a portal to a different world, massive and challenging structural designs like a broken bridge, pipe system, and more, creating a captivating climbing experience where challenges are non-linear, allowing players to choose different routes.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Simple and Intuitive Parkour Mechanics
<!--text-->
Jump into action with parkour controls designed for quick mastery. With a straightforward pull-up function and a built-in timer, you can focus on refining your speed and discovering hidden shortcuts along varied paths. Each playthrough offers a new opportunity to challenge yourself, conquer fresh obstacles, and aim for the fastest route to the top.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Clean and Engaging Visuals
<!--text-->
Enjoy a visually appealing experience with environments crafted to draw you in. The map is divided into areas, each with its own distinct theme, offering a variety of visuals that keep the climb fresh and exciting. From atmospheric mazes to stunning landscapes, every location enhances your journey to the top.
